name: Projekt Melody: A Nut Between Worlds!
storyline:
While nutting to your favorite streamer, Projekt Melody, you get sucked into her virtual world!

Discover a multitude of vibrant worlds, teeming with adventure and mystery! Build and explore intimate relationships with the sexy and sensual inhabitants, each with their own unique personality! There's a waifu for everyone!

Uncover the secrets behind the menacing virus plaguing the lands, and fight alongside your friends (with benefits!) to defend Virtual Little Tokyo from digital destruction!

Become the pervert hero you were born to be!
summary: Projekt Melody: A Nut Between Worlds! is an upcoming erotic action RPG where the player gets sucked into Virtual Little Tokyo, a vibrant city nestled in the heart of Cyberspace! Go on adventures across dozens of interesting worlds, filled with dark and menacing sex dungeons, tech-enhanced civilizations, and cute maid cafes!.
